game.name: Berghotel Heist
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In this thrilling co-op horror heist game, you are trapped in an haunted Alpine hotel inhabited by a Percht and other menacing creatures from Alpine folklore. Only through teamwork, stealth and puzzle-solving skills you can escape alive.
